    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17356455">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17356455">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17356455">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17356455">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17356455" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17356456">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17356456">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17356456">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17356456">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17356456" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17356457">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17356457">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17356457">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17356457">
          <div id="boxatt17356457" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20430847">
              <a id="link_20430847" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430847,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religions of Japan', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20439957">
              Kodansha Encyclopedia of Japan
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Trexler Library level C  call # 952 K76
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17356458">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17356458">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17356458">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate scholarly books on my topic?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17356458">
          <div id="boxatt17356458" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20430816">
              <a id="link_20430816" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430816,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religions of Japan', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Portions or full text are available for some books. Use WorldCat to acquire the full text of recent scholarly texts where only snippets are available online.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20430815">
              <a id="link_20430815" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430815,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religions of Japan', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Catalog of books and documents in research libraries throughout the world. Watch especially for the AREA LIBRARIES designation. Use in conjunction with interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17356459">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17356459">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17356459">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate scholarly articles (chapters or journal articles) on my topic?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17356459">
          <div id="boxatt17356459" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20430818">
              <a id="link_20430818" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430818,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religions of Japan', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Limit to "peer reviewed" or "academic journals" to get at the scholarly journals.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20430821">
              <a id="link_20430821" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=reh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430821,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religions of Japan', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12465744}); ">
               ATLA Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Specific to religion studies. Use caution here: not all sources included here are scholarly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20430820">
              <a id="link_20430820" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430820,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religions of Japan', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource. Some full text may be available, especially when searching from campus where library-subscribed full text is often linked directly to Google Scholar.  The surest way to verify all points of Muhlenberg access to any full text is to run a journal title search in the library catalog for the article in question.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20430819">
              <a id="link_20430819" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430819,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religions of Japan', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Archive from Stanford University of scholarly journals in all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17356460">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17356460">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17356460">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           What about authoritative websites?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17356460">
          <p>
           When using websites, consider the source: does it meet the criteria of scholarly/authoritative?
           <br />
           Compare:
           <br />
           <a href="http://www.japanese-incense.com/" target="_blank">
            http://www.japanese-incense.com/
            <br />
           </a>
           <a href="http://www.aisf.or.jp/~jaanus/" target="_blank">
            http://www.aisf.or.jp/~jaanus/
            <br />
           </a>
           <a href="http://www.stanford.edu/group/scbs/sztp3/translations/eihei_shingi/translations/tenzo_kyokun/translation.html" target="_blank">
            http://www.stanford.edu/group/scbs/sztp3/translations/eihei_shingi/translations/tenzo_kyokun/translation.html
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17356460" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20431846">
              <a id="link_20431846" href="http://www.google.com/advanced_search" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20431846,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religions of Japan', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20431846}); ">
               Advanced Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4710478" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17356461">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17356461">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17356461">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources and compiling an annotated bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17356461">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Trexler Library's Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           Help in writing annotated bibliographies in the Chicago style can be found
           <a href="http://library.ucf.edu/rosen/guide_annotated.php">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17356461" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17356462">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17356462">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17356462">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17356462">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17356462" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">

           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
